src:
Berita Terpopuler
Fakta Susu Beruang hingga Penampakan Hantu di Restoran
01 Nov 2019, 02:30 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Susu beruang adalah merek susu legendaris yang punya sejumlah fakta menarik. Ada juga kisah penampakan hantu di restoran yang tertangkap CCTV.Susu beruang atau Bear Brand sangat lekat di benak banyak orang. Susu ini identik dengan kemasan kaleng dan logo beruang. Tak hanya itu, khasiatnya untuk kesehatan juga sangat terkenal. Ternyata ada fakta menarik di balik sejarah susu beruang.Pembaca detikFood juga tertarik mengetahui kebenaran video viral mengenai sekelompok pria berpeci jilati alat makan. Disebut-sebut kumpulan pria tersebut adalah Muslim yang sedang siapkan makanan untuk umat Hindu di dalam masjid. Seperti apa kebenarannya?Jelang Halloween, aktivitas paranormal disebut meningkat. Tak heran muncul penampakan hantu di beberapa tempat. Keberadaan hantu itu pun terekam kamera pengawas (CCTV).Berikut deretan berita terpopuler detikFood yang berhasil menarik perhatian pembaca kemarin (31/10). (adr/odi)
Berita Terpopuler


Foto: Istimewa

1. Fakta susu beruangKepopuleran susu beruang atau Bear Brand juga ditambah dengan iklan menariknya. Ada 3 aspek yang jadi sorotan netizen. Susu ini merupakan susu sapi, namun logonya beruang dan logo di iklannya adalah naga.Pemilihan naga bukan tanpa sebab. Seorang pengguna Twitter membeberkan fakta menariknya. Naga dianggap sebagai makhluk legenda China yang sangat kuat. Menilik sejarahnya, Bear Brand ternyata sudah ada sejak 1906 di China. Begini kisah lengkapnya.Baca Juga: Terungkap! Ini 5 Fakta Menarik Seputar Susu Cap Beruang

(adr/odi)

Berita Terpopuler


Foto: Istimewa

2. Fakta video 'Muslim' jilati peralatan makanVideo viral yang diunggah Shiv Rajput pada awal Juni lalu memperlihatkan sekelompok pria menjilati piring, sendok, dan mangkuk. Pria tersebut disebut Muslim karena memakai baju putih dan peci.Belum lagi judul video yang menggiring opini publik, "Persiapan muslim saat Idul Fitri untuk memberikan makan umat Hindu". Hal ini pun sontak menimbulkan perdebatan netizen. Ternyata fakta di baliknya tidak seperti itu. Informasinya ada di bawah ini.Baca Juga: Ini Fakta Video Viral Pria Berpeci Jilati Peralatan Makan di Masjid

(adr/odi)

Berita Terpopuler


Foto: Istimewa

3. Penampakan hantu di CCTV restoranCCTV memungkinkan semua aktivitas di suatu tempat terekam, termasuk aktivitas makhluk tak kasat mata. Di sebuah restoran dan pub Inggris terlihat ada penampakan wanita misterius dalam restoran mereka.Pihak restoran mengklaim tampilan hantu wanita di CCTV itu terlihat seperti mengenakan gaun yang berjalan mengikuti seorang pelayan. Padahal saat itu pelayan tengah sibuk membersihkan piring dan gelas kotor dari meja restoran. Baca Juga: Seram! Pelayan Restoran Ini Bersihkan Meja Ditemani Hantu

(adr/odi)
text:
Most Popular News
Milk Bear Facts to Ghost Sightings in Restaurants
01 Nov 2019, 02:30 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: Special

Jakarta - Bear milk is a legendary milk brand that has a number of interesting facts. There is also the story of ghost sightings in restaurants caught by CCTV. Bear milk or Bear Brand is very closely in the minds of many people. This milk is identical to the tin can packaging and the bear logo. Not only that, its properties for health are also very well known. Apparently there are interesting facts behind the history of bear milk. Readers detikFood also interested in knowing the truth of a viral video about a group of men with licking caps. It is said the group of men are Muslims who are preparing food for Hindus in the mosque. What's the truth like? Ahead of Halloween, paranormal activity is called increasing. No wonder ghost sightings appear in several places. The existence of the ghost was recorded by a surveillance camera (CCTV). Following the list of the most popular detikFood news that managed to attract the attention of the reader yesterday (10/31). (adr / odi)
Most Popular News


Photo: Special

1. Facts on bear milk The popularity of bear milk or Bear Brand is also added to the attractive advertisement. There are 3 aspects to the spotlight of netizens. This milk is cow's milk, but the logo of the bear and the logo on the ad is dragon. The choice of the dragon is not without reason. A Twitter user revealed an interesting fact. The dragon is considered a very powerful Chinese legend. Judging from its history, Bear Brand has been around since 1906 in China. Here's the full story. Also Read: Revealed! These 5 Interesting Facts About Bear Milk Cap

(adr / odi)

Most Popular News


Photo: Special

2. The fact of the 'Muslim' video licking cutlery Viral video uploaded by Shiv Rajput in early June showed a group of men licking plates, spoons and bowls. The man was called Muslim because he wore a white shirt and cap. Not to mention the title of the video that led to public opinion, "Muslim preparations during Eid al-Fitr to feed Hindus". This also instantly caused a netizens debate. It turns out the facts behind it are not like that. Information is below. Read Also: This Facts Viral Videos Men with Hat Licking Tableware at the Mosque

(adr / odi)

Most Popular News


Photo: Special

3. Ghost sightings on CCTV restaurantsCCTV allow all activities in a place to be recorded, including the activity of invisible creatures. In a British restaurant and pub there is a mysterious appearance of a woman in their restaurant. The restaurant claims that the appearance of the ghost of the woman on the CCTV looks like she is wearing a dress that follows a waiter. Even though at that time the waiter was busy cleaning dirty dishes and glasses from the restaurant table. Also Read: Spooky! This Restaurant Waiter Cleaned The Table Accompanied By A Ghost

(adr / odi)
